Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
This is the base class for server communication. It receives data from all connections and the connection listener and passes messages to the GameController

    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​SocketConnection> clients

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(GameController gameController)
      Default constructor
      Parameters:
      gameController - The GameController destination for messages.

  • Method Details

    • onLogin

      public void onLogin​(java.lang.String nickname, SocketConnection connection)
      Handles a login to the system, both to enter a lobby and to reconnect.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The client's nickname.
      connection - The connection class associated to the logging in client.

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage​(Message message, SocketConnection connection)
      This handles all received messages, including the login.
      Parameters:
      message - Received message
      connection - SocketConnection object where the message originates. Only used for login messages.

    • onDisconnect

      public void onDisconnect​(SocketConnection connection)
      Handles disconnections from the server.
      Parameters:
      connection - The connection which is terminated.

    • fromConnectionToNickname

      public java.lang.String fromConnectionToNickname​(SocketConnection connection)
      Utility method to reverse access the clients map by connections.
      Parameters:
      connection - The connection you want to get the nickname from.
      Returns:
      The returned nickname.
